## Checklist

**Before submitting:**

- [ ] I have read [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have searched existing issues and PRs to avoid duplicates
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my changes
- [ ] I have commented my code where needed, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have tested my changes with multiple LLM providers (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md with my changes
- [ ] I have added examples or test cases demonstrating the changes (if applicable)
